name: GMTK-Jam-Amputated
description:
Play Amputated a fun puzzle game where you can throw your limbs! Use your limbs to do all sorts of puzzles! Help the main character find his heart!


Controls

- WASD TO MOVE

- F Hold Leg Lim

- R Hold Arm Limbs

- Mouse 0 To throw the limbs

=====CREDITS=====

Programmer: Kcdxplay,  jjFriends, JakJak

Artest: Cross_XxXxX, Kcdxplay, jjFriends
